content.text1: The is our opportunity to work towards justice and peace in some of the most vulnerable places around the world. As the church, it's our responsibility to stand for people who have been marginalized by working to meet their tangible needs.
Through Peacemakers we support Mennonite Central Committee to walk with vulnerable people as they actualize their own vision for their community.

content.text1: Peacemakers is a collective initiative. Our community is invited to donate financially in the form of Peace Cards and Relief Kits. This year our Relief Kits will be going to Jordan to people affected by the conflict in Syria. Why Peacemakers? Peacemakers is one the biggest opportunity for our church to collectively pursue Jesus’ message of peace and model his profound love for people who have been pushed to the margins. It is a means for us to subvert the narrative that we must accumulate wealth and challenges us to think as global citizens. By participating in this campaign we choose to give generously to efforts in our world that seek to bring healing, redemption and justice to God’s creation.
